label: ZMNHVD
info_overview: Universal dimmer module with a standard 0-10V output and a multi-function input, which may be a push button / switch, a potentiometer or 0-10V signalÂ
info_inclusion:
• press service button S for more than 2 second or
  • press push button I1 three times within 3s (3 times change switch state within 3 seconds)
info_exclusion:
• press service button S for more than 6 second or
  • press push button I1 five times within 3s ( 5 times change switch state within 3 seconds) in the first 60 seconds after the module is connected to the power supply

category_description: Any device attached to the wall that controls a binary status of something, for ex. a light switch

parameters.label: Input 1 Switch Type
parameters.overview: By this parameter the user can set input based on device type (switch, potentiometer, 0-10V sensor,...)

parameters.label: Automatic turning off output after set time
Automatic turning on output after set time
Saving the state after a power failure
D parameter
parameters.description: Available config. parameters (data type is2 Byte DEC):

associations.label: Lifeline
associations.description: Reserved for communication with the main controller

associations.label: basic on/off
associations.description: triggered at change of the input I1 state and reflecting its state

associations.label: start level change/stop level change
associations.description: triggered at change of the input I1 state and reflecting its state) up to 16 nodes. Working only when the Parameter no. 1 is set to mono stable switch type.

associations.label: multilevel set
associations.description: triggered at changes of state/value of the Flush Dimmer 0-10V

associations.label: multilevel sensor report -  analogue sensor
associations.description: triggered at change of analogue sensor

associations.label: multilevel sensor report - temperature sensor
associations.description: triggered at change of temperature sensor

commandclass.name: NO_OPERATION
commandclass.label: No Operation - used for PINGing a device.

warnings: Endpoint 0 contains both switch and dimmer channels. It probably should only include dimmer!
notices: Endpoint 0 has no command class linked to the basic class.
